Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this card during the Damage Step.
2. You cannot activate this card if there are no face-up monsters on the field.
3. You cannot activate this card if a face-up monster is removed from play as a cost.
4. You cannot activate this card when a Token or a Trap Card treated as a monster is removed from play.
5. You can activate this card if your monster is destroyed by "Acid Trap Hole" while "Macro Cosmos" is on the field.
6. [FORUM] When the effect of "D.D. Warrior Lady" resolves in the Damage Step, you cannot activate "Zero Force".
